title: Anyone know how the spectator time works?
body:
So the spectator time for me nearly always says 10xx:xx or 11xx:xx where the x's change. I know that the last to numbers are representing seconds but how do I read this number and instantly know that it's been 5 minutes or 30 minutes. I prefer to watch games that are close to fresh as possible so I can see how certain people play a champ and get a rough idea for the way to build early and such.
It's really starting to annoy me that the time seems so random and large, does anyone know why?

replies.body:
The 'spectate now' feature is actually completely broken for a lot of people. I think Riot would prioritise fixing that first above a timing error like that.

And they don't seem to be fixing it anytime soon either.
